items.content_html: LeaderLine is a lightweight JavaScript library for creating and managing leader lines, also known as flow lines or connectors, between elements in a web page. This library simplifies the process of visually connecting elements with customizable lines, arrows, and styles. It is particularly useful for enhancing the visual hierarchy and relationships
items.title: joelprince2601/LeaderLine: LeaderLine is a lightweight JavaScript library for creating and managing leader lines, also known as flow lines or connectors, between elements in a web page. This library simplifies the process of visually connecting elements with customizable lines, arrows, and styles. It is particularly useful for enhancing the visual hierarchy and relationships

items.content_html: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.
items.title: ietxaniz/curldock: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
